about_the_game:
Game uses Google Translate

《 Fantastic Kingdom》Is a Japanese RPG and an independent game
No complicated hidden elements, you can easily clear the level
Simple operation and easy to use, bring you an authentic Japanese RPG experience
All material in the game is licensed


Hanabi is a magic swordsman who travels around and spends his time making new friends and defeating enemies.
At the same time, a huge conspiracy is quietly underway ...


  • Easy-to-use but strategy-based turn-based combat.
  • Each profession has its own unique skills and skills, each profession has a powerful nirvana.
  • Monsters dodging by walking, relatively free choice to fight.
  • Freely explore the underground palace and open the treasure chest, which contains the most valuable legendary equipment.
  • Nearly 50 high-quality BGMs, immersed in the world of the kingdom fantasy.
  • As the protagonist travels to various places: warm villages, monster-covered forests, bustling towns, and dangerous caves.


  • Annoying random battles.
  • Limited save points.
  • Depressed protagonists.
  • Points of no return.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7/WIN8/WIN10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent AMD
  • Memory: 800 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 280 series or higher
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Intergarated sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7/WIN8/WIN10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This is a relaxed and casual role-playing game. You will embark on a mysterious and fantasy journey, face unknown challenges and unpredictable battles, and discover secrets hidden deep in the kingdom.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
